title: Transforming Two Fears - FOF and FOMO (2021-03-24)
itunes:title: Transforming Two Fears - FOF and FOMO
description: Transforming Two Fears - FOF and FOMO (2021-03-24) - There are two common fears that can block us from our full potential - fear of failure (FOF), and fear of missing out (FOMO). This talk explores how to meet these fears with mindful presence, and discover within them the essence energies of loving awareness and full aliveness.
